I have the same problem here. the games doesn't loads the "think like a gun mission" (4th mission).

ATTENTION !!!

If you want to get over the Mission 4 "Think Like A Gun" crash...

Go to www.gamecopyworld.com, Search "Kill.Switch" and download the save game with all the missions

Then, choose load it, open mission select & choose the one after "Middle East"
